data.comment: The match is underway at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Vaclav Cerny.
In the minute 22, That's a fine assist from Danilo.
Goal! Danilo extends Enschede's lead to 2-0.
Vaclav Cerny with an assist there.
In the minute 42, Groningen's Bart van Hintum has been booked in Enschede.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Sander van der Eijk has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 52, Goal for Groningen! They are now just 2-1 behind thanks to a Ahmed El Messaoudi header.
Gijs Smal is on a sub for Jayden Oosterwolde for Enschede.
Enschede make their second substitution with Lazaros Lamprou replacing Vaclav Cerny.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist with Remco Balk. This is the first substitution made today by Danny Buijs.
Romano Postema is replacing Jorgen Strand Larsen for Groningen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Danny Buijs is making the team's third substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Patrick Joosten replacing Mo El Hankouri.
In the minute 76, Miguel Angel Leal is replacing Bart van Hintum for the away team.
Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a fifth substitution, with Tomas Suslov replacing Wessel Dammers.
Alexander Jeremejeff is replacing Danilo for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
In the minute 79, Godfried Roemeratoe, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ramiz Zerrouki is the substitute for Enschede.
Alexander Jeremejeff scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 3-1.
Great play from Gijs Smal to set up the goal.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Ron Jans is making the team's fifth substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Dario Dumic replacing Queensy Menig.
